channel.title: [317]How do I code portals with multiple options?
channel.description:
I know this is a very simple feature, but I'm new to 317s, having previously coded RSC emulations.
How do I make a portal that offers the user multiple options and then -teleports- them there, not transports instantly?
Thanks,
d.v.c
